dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here's a summary of your tarot business.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: View and manage your client list.

add.title: Add New Customer
add.description: Enter the details for the new client below.
add.success_toast_desc: The new client has been successfully added to your roster.

services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: A list of the tarot reading services offered.

general.title: General Reading
general.description: A big picture overview of the current energies. Suitable for clients without specific questions.

love.title: Love & Relationship Reading
love.description: Romantic relationships (partner, ex, potential). Love energy, loyalty, future of the relationship. Suitable for those in courtship, LDR, or conflict.

career.title: Career & Business Reading
career.description: Career direction, job choices, business opportunities. Suitable for those contemplating resignation, interviews, promotions.

finance.title: Finance Reading
finance.description: Financial energy, fortune opportunities, expenses, investments. Can be combined with actionable advice.

spiritual.title: Spiritual & Healing Reading
spiritual.description: Aura, karma, past life, inner energy reading. Suitable for those in need of self-reflection or emotional healing.

yesNo.title: Yes or No Reading
yesNo.description: A direct answer to one specific question. Quick and simple, suitable for express services.

timeBased.title: Time-based Reading
timeBased.description: Weekly, monthly, or yearly energy. A forecast for a specific period.

ppf.title: Past-Present-Future Reading
ppf.description: Highlights the past, current situation, and future predictions.

soulmate.title: Soulmate / Twin Flame Reading
soulmate.description: Soul connections, spiritual relationships, destined partners.

chakra.title: Chakra or Energy Reading
chakra.description: Assesses the balance of the body's energy or chakras.

reading.title: New AI Reading
reading.description: Draw cards for a client and generate a personalized, AI-powered interpretation.
reading.spreadDescription: The classic Past, Present, and Future spread.
reading.loadingMessage: The spirits are whispering... please wait.

toast.missingInfoDesc: Please select a client and draw cards first.
toast.failedDesc: The AI could not provide an interpretation. Please try again.
